meanings: (형편) a state, a situation, circumstances, a condition
be on the point[verge, brink] of

vlive.korean: 지난 10년간 민주만 쳐다보다가 화가 머리끝까지 날 지경이었지만! I was going crazy for loving Minju for the last 10 years. 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
vlive.english: I was going crazy for loving Minju for the last 10 years.

vlive.korean: 소리가 안 나올 지경이었어요. I couldn't even make a sound. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: I couldn't even make a sound.

vlive.korean: [안 터짐 설 박을 의심하는 지경] 이거 터지긴 터져? 이거 그냥 손으로 해볼까? [Doubting the gourd] Does it ever open? Can we use our hands? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: [Doubting the gourd] Does it ever open? Can we use our hands?

vlive.korean: 나도 눈물날 지경으로 좋아하는 거 알죠? You know I love you so much too, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 나 보고시퍼쬬?
vlive.english: You know I love you so much too, right?

vlive.korean: [이것을 승아지경이라고 부르자 .mp4] - 뭐야? 뭐야? - 쿠킹 댄스 몰라? What is that? - You don't know cooking dance? 듣기 View video CIX : HELLO CIX BEHIND 1 :: 큐티뽀짝 씨앗's
vlive.english: What is that? - You don't know cooking dance?

examples.korean: He was apoplectic with rage at the decision. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 결정에 너무 화가 나서 졸도할 지경이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
